name: @okp4/okp4-grpc-client
description: Typescript gRPC client for ØKP4 and by extension, CØSMOS based blockchains.

scripts.generate:
yarn run clean && protoc -I=../proto/cosmos-sdk -I=../proto/okp4 $(find ../proto -type f -name '*.proto' | tr '
' ' ') --js_out=import_style=commonjs,binary:gen-ts --grpc-web_out=import_style=typescript,mode=grpcweb:gen-ts
scripts.hack: find gen-ts -type d | cut -d '/' -f2- | xargs -I {} mkdir -p dist/{} && find gen-ts -type f -name *.d.ts | cut -d '/' -f2- | xargs -I {} cp gen-ts/{} dist/{} && find gen-ts -type f -name *.js | cut -d '/' -f2- | xargs -I {} cp gen-ts/{} dist/{}
